## Summary

A brief description of the feature you'd like.

## Problem / Use Case

What problem does this solve? Why would this be useful?

## Proposed Solution

How do you envision this working?

## Alternatives Considered

Have you considered other approaches? Why is this the best option?

## Scope Check

Flightsim is a lightweight skyriding HUD. Does this feature fit that scope?

- [ ] Yes, it relates to skyriding flight data or ability tracking
- [ ] It's a general QoL improvement that doesn't add bloat

## Additional Context

Mockups, examples from other addons, or any other relevant information.
